title: Does Costco Lose Millions Annually for Keeping Rotisserie Chicken Cheap?
subtitle: The $4.99 price tag has held firm for one of the company’s most popular items.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Costco loses an estimated $30 to $40 million a year by keeping rotisserie chickens at $4.99 each. But the company would rather keep members happy and foot traffic high.
